com.tractrac.subscription.lib.api

Class AbstractSubscriptionTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • com.tractrac.model.lib.api.AbstractModelTest
          • com.tractrac.subscription.lib.api.AbstractSubscriptionTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompetitorsEventTest, ControlsEventTest, PositionEventTest, RaceCompetitorTest, RacesEventTest, StaticControlTest, StaticRaceStartStopTimesChangeTest, StaticRoutesChangesTest

    public abstract class AbstractSubscriptionTest
extends AbstractModelTest

    Abstract class that can be inherited for the test classes. It has utility methods to create a ILocalDataserver that can be used to test the subscription implementation.

    Author:
    Jorge Piera Llodrá
    See Also:
    Mock Object

    • Method Detail

      • addDataserverToEvent

        public ILocalDataserver addDataserverToEvent(IEvent event)
                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                             java.net.URISyntaxException
        Create a local dataserver that can be used to establish a communication with the subscription library. It uses both the live and the stored connections.
        Parameters:
        event - the event
        Returns:
        a local dataserver
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error creating the sockets
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if there is an error creating the URIs

      • addDataserverToEvent

        public ILocalDataserver addDataserverToEvent(IEvent event,
                                    boolean isLive,
                                    boolean isStored)
                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                             java.net.URISyntaxException
        Create a local dataserver that can be used to establish a communication with the subscription library.
        Parameters:
        event - the event
        isLive - if the subscription uses the live connection
        isStored - if the subscription uses the stored connection
        Returns:
        a local dataserver
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error creating the sockets
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if there is an error creating the URIs
